attributes.action: Please protect our most vulnerable citizens from abuse at the hands of others.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: something needs to be put in place to stop our most vulnerable citizens from suffering abuse at the hands of others! be it verbal abuse or physical. people with special learning/ educational needs need to be able to live in society in peace, not living in fear of bullying and others taking advantage. Thank you
